id: Notion Template: Weekly Dashboard + Task Database
name: Notion Template: Weekly Dashboard + Task Database
description: This is my weekly agenda which connects with a master task, project, and tags database. I've also included a place for notes and habit tracking! It's been tweaked for more general purposes, but feel free to make this template your own and link your own databases. Includes:* Weekly Agenda* Task and Project Database* Master Tags Database* Notes Page* Habit Tracker
